Now, the code's Dijkstra function has a problem. Let me look again at the Dijkstra function's code:

def dijkstra(G, dist, INF=1e11):

    N = len(dist)
    hp = []
    for i in range(N):
        heappush(hp, dist[i]*B +i)
    while hp:
        cv = heappop(hp)
        c, v = cv//B, cv % B
        if dist[v] < c:
            continue
        for u, cost in G[v]:
            if dist[u] > dist[v] + cost:
                dist[u] = dist[v] + cost
                heappush(hp, dist[u]*B + u)
    return dist
